segments.text: What's the occasion ? You won the lottery ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Just want to relax a little bit . You don't have to win the lottery to relax , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am kind of broke .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? It's very nice of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be silly . I'll take you anywhere you wanna go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! You know what ? I wish you wanted to relax everyday .
segments.speaker: S2
